mapper.select: select coalesce(max(question_num),0) + 1 as question_num from internal_exams_duolingo_blank_question where duolingo_blank_id = #{duolingo_blank_id}

select a.id, to_char(a.created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as created, a.created_id, concat(coalesce(b.last_name,''),coalesce(b.first_name,'')) as created_name, to_char(a.modified,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as modified, a.modified_id, concat(coalesce(c.last_name,''),coalesce(c.first_name,'')) as modified_name, a.duolingo_blank_id, a.question_num, a.question from internal_exams_duolingo_blank_question a left join auth_user b on a.created_id = b.id left join auth_user c on a.modified_id = c.id where a.duolingo_blank_id = #{duolingo_blank_id} order by a.question_num
mapper.insert: insert into internal_exams_duolingo_blank_question ( created, created_id, modified, modified_id, duolingo_blank_id, question_num, question ) values ( now(), #{created_id}, now(), #{modified_id}, #{duolingo_blank_id}, #{question_num}, #{question} )
